headline.main: Nazis at Soviet Rail Towns; Stalingrad Defenders Hold; GERMANS GAINING IN CAUCASUS PUSH

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Sunday, Aug. 2 -- The Germans have made big strides forward from the Bataisk sector of the Western Caucasus. They followed railroads in their drives to the Salsk and Kushchevka districts, mentioned this morning in a Russian communi que for the first time. Salsk is on the main Stalingrad-Krasnodar rail line, and Kushchevka is on the line running southward from Rostov.
abstract: Gers continue Caucasus gains; Kushchevka rr dist taken; Stalingrad defenders hold; stubborn fighting reptd, Tsimlyansk area; USSR admits Ger capture of Salsk and Kushchevka areas; Ger tanks smashed, Kletskaya area
